title: Saving the Stallion
description: After the strong, silent cowboy named Stetson Carthswaite fights off a psychopathic murderer, the local police frame him for first-degree murder. Not even Stetson, with all his strength and stamina, can beat the backwards town of Baggs, Wyoming, when the lead prosecutor vows to make sure the jury sends him to death. This time, Carter Simmons must carry the burden of saving the cowboy from almost certain death should the jury convict Stetson. Will Stetson end up on death row, or can Carter save him?This 7000+ word short story contains scenes of graphic sexuality and violence. 18+ only allowed!Total Page ~50 pages. Please note this novella includes two complementary novels with your purchase, with links to other stories you might find interesting.
author: Candy Collins
